collections_text:
# Highland Art Center

### Welcome to the

### Highland Art Center

The Highland Art Center is a cultural arts campus in the heart of historic downtown Weaverville including a main gallery, arts library, formal gardens, large events meadow, and artist's studios. 

[Learn More](/mission-history)
